known_issues: Draft Version 27 shows blank page in preview - deployment may not have completed successfully

existing_features.title: Diagnose and fix the blank page issue in Draft Version 27 where the preview shows a completely white screen with no content rendering
Verify that all static assets (images, fonts, CSS) are loading correctly from their expected paths
Ensure the HTML entry point (frontend/index.html) correctly references the main JavaScript bundle and root div element

new_feature_requests.summary: Check for JavaScript errors or console warnings that might prevent React application initialization
